body: @Incheon at the end he says he never thought that something that was made to make others happy would make him sad. YA PLAYED YOURSELF, MC.

@Incheon as far as i can tell through google translate he works for a business where lonely depressed men pay for sex and are filmed and the film is sold online. MC tells his gf(?) that he wants her to help the business or else he'll likely turn to crime (i think that part is a joke). She suggests she does all 3 guys at once to save time or be more efficient.
So what? she have the ability to make sperm rain
THE PUN ON THE TITLE IS JUST👌
So the bf needed reference material for his art, or did he just want to be cucked?
